Confidential Remarks: Bring your investors and Buyers looking to build some sweat equity. With a little updating, this property can be a beauty and can demand good rent. Back unit apartment was rented for $1900/mo in the existing condition. Remodel and a new owner can increase the earnings potential. House in front was used by owner's family members. Don't miss bonus space in basement. This property has been virtually staged and does not necessarily represent its current condition. No representation is made as to the accuracy of any photograph(s) or virtual / video tour, nor should they be relied upon. Call listing agent for access info. Easy to show. Both units vacant.
Public Remarks: This classic Ivy Hill home exudes charm and character and is a rare find. It has an apartment built over the garage w/ its own address and entry: 1936 5th Avenue. The main house is a lovely split level bungalow w/ 2 bedrooms and 1 bath on the main floor and not to be missed bonus space in the basement. It features dramatic bay windows in the living & dining room, a built-in buffet w/ glass fronted doors, a wood burning fireplace flanked with bookcases, a breakfast nook off the spacious kitchen, and finished storage in the basement. Live in one and rent the other for added income as the apartment offers a full living room, dining room, kitchen, bedroom and bath. The double doors to the living room provides an option to make it a 2nd bedroom or office. Many of the systems have been upgraded over the years. The main house offers updated electrical, copper plumbing and central heat. So much potential on this tree lined street in a convenient location. This property has been virtually staged.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Shalene Rose - 510-381-3117 - Welcome to 457 Athol Avenue! First time on the market in close to 30 years, this home is an amazing opportunity in a coveted neighborhood! Just minutes from Lake Merritt & BART, this sunny home in Oakland’s wonderful Cleveland Heights neighborhood has a lovely fully fenced patio/backyard, charming vintage architectural details, and a large basement plus attached garage. So much charm and space! 457 Athol features an oversized sun-drenched foyer, light filled living room, vintage built-in cabinets with original glass doors around fireplace, formal dining room, three sunny spacious bedrooms, one bathroom, and large open kitchen leading to the yard. Wood floors are throughout much of the home. Kitchen has original solid wood cabinetry, ample counter space, newer stainless-steel fridge, & rare Black Merritt & O’Keefe gas range. Downstairs has laundry room, bonus room, and attached garage. Tucked away on quiet Athol Avenue off of Brooklyn, you’re minutes to the Lake, BART, and shopping on Lakeshore Avenue. Near 580/880 freeway, Lucky’s, Trader Joe’s, Whole Foods, many hip restaurants and bars, Grand Lake Theater and so much more.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Cassandra Cruz - 510-255-3707 - Situated in historic Ivy Hill, this two-story Tudor effuses timeless elegance and original details that blend seamlessly with elevated modern design elements. Upstairs you'll find two bedrooms; one acts as a primary suite with an attached “sunroom” that overlooks the backyard. A remodeled bathroom with dual sinks and shower/tub is accessible via both the primary bedroom and main hallway. Downstairs, the living room leads into the dining area with original pocket doors. A decorative fireplace and built-in cabinetry compliment the dining room featuring wainscoting and chair rail molding. The kitchen offers stainless steel appliances and subway tile backsplash. A third bedroom with ensuite bathroom and a stackable laundry unit and half bath off the kitchen present desirable convenience. This property also has a detached space* with a sleeping loft. In the backyard you'll find a landscaped garden and a spacious, covered patio area. Convenient access to Glenview, Dimond, and Lakeshore but local favorites include Champa Garden and Xochi the Dog Café. * Neither the seller nor listing agent has investigated or verified the accuracy of any of these sources of information, nor do they guarantee any short-term nor increase in future long-term rental income. Buyer to investigate.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Gillian Leslie - 510-410-2344 - 2626 Ivy Drive, a mix of classic European architecture, is perched atop Ivy Hill, an ornament of its namesake. With iIntricate stucco detailing, immaculately preserved woodwork, and spacious formal rooms, the home’s timeless character and splendor present a remarkable revival opportunity. The home provides 3 formal bedrooms with generous closets, plus 2 bonus rooms ideal for home office or guests. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Nora Moakher - Agt: 510-290-6630 - Discover the charm of this stately California Bungalow nestled on a corner lot in a vibrant community of architecturally interesting homes. With its stately presence and lush greenery, this unique property invites you to explore its character and charisma. From the main gate, ascend a staircase to the inviting front porch that opens to a living room centered around a fireplace, adorned with symmetrical windows and bookshelves. Through French doors, the formal dining room boasts a large central window and a built-in cabinet. For tranquility and privacy, an updated bathroom conveniently separates the two bedrooms. A versatile enclosed solarium in the back provides access to the backyard, serving as an ideal office or creative space. The generous-sized basement offers storage and potential for expansion or addition. Enjoy the zen ambiance of both the front yard with palm trees and evergreens & the grassy backyard, awaiting your personal touch to transform into a true urban oasis. PSL compliant. This charismatic California Bungalow, surrounded by palm trees, is ideally located minutes away from Lake Merritt, highway entries and roadways to downtown Oakland, Alameda, and San Francisco. Don't miss the opportunity to experience the best of the Bay!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Julia Temple - 510-759-3677 - Welcome to a home where community spirit thrives, nestled in a neighborhood that celebrates life with every heartbeat. Imagine a place where neighbors become friends over shared meals at charming local restaurants, where dogs play freely, children laugh, and the soulful notes of jazz festivals fill the air. This lovingly updated, single-level gem boasts three bedrooms and two modern baths. The owner’s touch is evident in every detail, from the hand-selected tiles to the elegant engineered hardwood floors that flow throughout. Bright natural light beaming through the open space. Step outside to your private oasis, featuring organic raised beds perfect for garden enthusiasts, a lush lawn area for play, and a serene patio for relaxing or entertaining. The lush passion fruit vines dance along the fence, lemon, grapefruit, and orange trees, a blackberry vine and a raspberry bush enhance the haven for family and pets alike. Located close to the tranquil beauty of Lake Merritt and local restaurants, this home offers not just a place to live, but a vibrant lifestyle. Experience the perfect blend of urban convenience and natural beauty, all within a community that feels like home.Come and see how life can be beautifully connected.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: David Gunderman - 510-205-4369 - The best of California living awaits in this fully updated 3BR/1BA bungalow in Oakland’s Bella Vista neighborhood. Set back from the street, a Mediterranean garden, covered porch, and classic stoop welcome you to the 1263 SQFT home. The bright living room has a large picture window, and two more windows flank the vintage statement fireplace original to the 1920 home. Two artistic niches are built into the fireplace and the wall to display your treasures. Gorgeous hardwood floors span the home and into the sunny dining room which adjoins the fabulously remodeled kitchen. With beautiful quartz counters, a wall of high-end cabinetry, and a large farmhouse sink, the kitchen is a jewel-tone dream. A laundry area is nearby, and a flexible room offers space to sleep, work, or play. In another wing, two light-filled bedrooms with multiple closets and a renovated full size bath enjoy privacy and quiet. Central air-conditioning keeps the home cool, or you can enjoy time outside in the expansive backyard with a patio, mature landscaping, and maintenance free turf. A long tandem driveway allows for multiple parking spaces, and the home has an easy commute via 580 or BART. Lively Lake Merritt is nearby for dining, shopping, and walking the dog.
Confidential Remarks: Open House, Sunday, 6/30 2-4. Lead Listing Agent is Hans Struzyna 510-768-8228 hans@thegundermangroup.com. Bed/Bath/Square Feet may not match public records - buyer to verify/satisfy.  The taking of images of this property is limited to those persons preparing Appraisal or Inspection reports. The renovated bathroom features a new tub & fixtures, new vanity, toilet & lighting. Nearly $100,000 of upgrades also include a new roof, new sump pump, fresh interior & exterior paint, new luxury vinyl flooring, recessed lights & modern lighting complete this home. You'll appreciate the detached garage & the expansive 488 sqft basement with laundry room & storage. A walk score of 88, enjoy leisurely bike rides or strolls to the iconic Lake Merritt, explore the weekend farmer's market, catch a film at the historic Grand Lake Theater, walk to top rated Cleveland Elementary, grocery shopping at Trader Joe's & savor the local culinary delights at nearby restaurants & bar

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Nestled in the quiet & quaint Ivy Hill, this 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom residence offers timeless period details seamlessly integrated into contemporary designs. The grand-scale living room features a modern electric fireplace & high wood-beamed ceilings. Enjoy formal dining in the dining room with built-in buffet and a sliding door leading to the backyard, creating a seamless blend of indoor and outdoor dining experiences. The fully renovated kitchen boasts a large island, new sleek cabinets, ample surface space, and abundant storage in the adjacent butler's pantry. Conveniently located next to the kitchen is the laundry room. On the main level, there is also a full bathroom. Ascend a short flight of stairs to the upper level where you'll find 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The generous primary suite includes two closets and a private balcony. Throughout the home, hardwood floors and recessed lighting add to the ambiance. House was completedly renovated in 2019 with new foundation,electrial, plumbing and furnace, etc. The expansive, level backyard features a lovely patio, perfect for hosting gatherings. 1-2 parking spaces in the driveway. This prime location is just minutes away from Lake Merritt, Lakeshore &walking distance to Xochi cafe & Champa Garden, etc.
Confidential Remarks: Go directly. Escrow opened with Nancy Chan at Chicago Title.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This lovely two bedroom, one bath Ivy Hill home features a formal living room and dining room showcasing original charm with detailed wood trim surrounding the beautiful built in china cabinet and charming fire place. The house is well-maintained and has been updated with both a modern kitchen and bath. The property also includes a one car garage with electronic door opener, an unfinished basement, offering ample space for storage or even a workshop. The landscaped front and backyards feature planting areas, greenery and mature fruit bearing trees. Additionally, there is a cozy enclosed entrance porch area, providing a wonderful space for outdoor relaxation. The location of the home with proximity to Park Blvd., is highly convenient, with easy access to shopping, restaurants, and transportation options.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: David Gunderman - 510-205-4369 - This magnificent 4522 SqFt Queen Anne triplex home is a rare beauty that offers meticulous Victorian beauty with fully upgraded & modern kitchens & baths, allowing for a myriad of configurations.  Vacant, move in ready for owner-occupants, investors, or both. Fully restored to its original dignity and grandeur, all of the original period details are intact, including stained glass windows, woodwork, hardware, 12’ ceilings with decorative plaster medallions, oak floors and original light fixtures. 3 separate floors are 3BR/1.5BA each ~1500 SqFt; the bottom flat has 4 bedrooms. New foundation, shear walls, moment frame and structural improvements. Built in 1889, the original architectural flourishes remain intact in sunlit rooms with bay windows, large bedrooms, and spacious eat-in kitchens birch cabinets & black granite. Electricality, gas, and water lines are all isolated to each unit, with separate meters for electric service. Separate laundries and water heaters, and extra storage. The attached garage provides for 2 tandem parking spaces, with 3 additional separate parking spaces (4+ total) on the property. Located in the historic Clinton district, walk to Lake Merritt or Grand Lake for restaurants, shopping, movies, Transbay bus, and farmers market.
Confidential Remarks: Open House Sat/Sun 10/21 & 10/22 2-4. Michael Casey Bradley is lead agent 510-872-9654 casey@thegundermangroup.com. Supra is on the hose bib water pipe to the right of the front porch. Gate door code is 7395. Bed/Bath/Square Feet and unit count may not match public records - buyer to verify/satisfy. The taking of images of this property is limited to those persons preparing Appraisal or Inspection reports.   Matterport and website: 2101-9th.com OFFER DATE: WED 10/25 by noon

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Valerie Vicente - Agt: 925-362-2288 - Welcome to the sparkling gem on the corner of tree-lined Kenwyn Road. This pristine mid-century modern ranch style home was custom built in 1950. For the past 44 years it has been meticulously remodeled, updated and impeccably cared for by the same owner! Upon entering, the massive windows let the light stream in and allow you to enjoy the captivating beauty of the mature landscaping.A elegant gas fireplace with blue-eyes granite surround is at the center of the room and invites you to pull up a chair and relax. The open concept living/dining room with sliding door to the yard, is ideal for entertaining. The celestial contemporary kitchen features custom cabinetry by ZMC, Stainless Steel appliances, blue pearl granite countertops, white subway tile backsplash, custom pantry and a sliding door to the spacious, very private back yard, ideal to dine alfresco. The living is all on one floor and boasts gleaming hardwood floors throughout. Downstairs features a convenient mud/utility room and garage with EV-outlet and built-in storage. The yard has multiple seating areas, a plethora of blooming plants, opulent wisteria and lemon tree! This incredibly quiet neighborhood is close to good schools, shopping, dining, Lake Merritt and transportation. Who is ready to claim this sparkling gem?
Confidential Remarks: Pre-Escrow is open with Haidee Mizrachi at Old Republic Title Company. Please submit all offers through DISCLOSURES.IO ONLY! All offers must include proof of funds and signed DIO Coversheet. Any questions, please call/text Valerie Vicente on her CELL PHONE ONLY - 925.413.5772 - office phone number does not accept text - or, Lynn La Rue at 925.876.6023. OFFERS, if any, to be submitted by Wednesday, August 9th at noon. Thank you for showing!
Directions to Property: Athol Ave to Cleveland St to Kenwyn Rd

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Heather Gonzalez - 510-599-0262 - This stately duplex on Stow offers a delightful blend of period details and modern amenities with stellar lake and city vista views. Flexible living options--use as an income property, or live in one and rent out the other, or use the second unit for a home office/studio. The bottom unit has two bedrooms and a Jack and Jill bathroom showcasing architectural and period details. Beautiful hardwood floors, built-in cabinets and the decorative fireplace add warmth and character to the home. The upper unit features a bright one bedroom and one bathroom with sweeping views of Lake Merritt. From this top level, you can spill out into the private backyard space, perfect for gardening or outdoor play. Situated just steps away from Lake Merritt, enjoy strolls or picnics around the lake or take a short walk to the farmer's market, cafes, shops, and restaurants on Grand Avenue and Lakeshore. The iconic Grand Lake Theater is conveniently nearby, providing entertainment options right at your doorstep. Experience the perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience inthe vibrant Oakland city setting.
Confidential Remarks: Back on the market, no fault of property. This is a DUPLEX. Owners used it as single family. Pls contact Heather (510) 599-0262 with questions. Sewer lateral and sidewalk compliant.

Remarks: Gary M Bernie - Agt: 925-200-2222 - This traditional Ivy Hill home has 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms and features a centerpiece living room that exudes character and warmth.The home has a sunlit living room, a kitchen with a designer island, with two spacious bedrooms on the upper level and two large bedrooms located on the lower level. The lower level has a separate entrance, making it ideal for an in-law unit.The yard offers endless possibilities for a beautiful garden area and ample space to entertain. Imagine hosting a BBQ on this sun-drenched premium corner lot.  Located minutes from the shops and restaurants and all that Oakland has to offer, with easy access to BART, public transportation, and freeway access. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Wainani Kalahele - Polished and picturesque in prime Cleveland Heights! This substantial 2,695 SF home has been fully updated with a brand-new main kitchen, bathrooms, refinished hardwood floors, lighting, and more. Brilliantly blending its storied 1920s charm with contemporary comfort and luxury, the interior includes a bright open living room with Georgian-style windows, recessed lighting, and fireplace. Continue through the formal dining room with a picturesque view, and into a reimagined kitchen, with new cabinetry, quartz countertops, and new appliances. Downstairs, you will find access to a fully equipped ADU with its own kitchen, bathroom and entry. Upstairs, is a spacious and serene primary suite that features a luxurious new bath and two additional generously sized bedrooms, with gorgeous light, spacious closets, and a new hallway bathroom. Outside, the front garden and private backyard are freshly landscaped with patios, planters, and trees. High quality craftsmanship and attention to detail are on display throughout this fully refreshed gem! Just minutes from Lake Merritt, Lakeshore local shops, cafes, and Farmer’s Market.
